TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASIs part of connector : ZAPLINK_MESSAGE ASDefine XML structure of a message class U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* LOCAL CLASS IMPLEMENTATION FOR PUBLIC CLASS *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA s_msg LIKE LINE OF messages.
CLEAR: * a0_maindata-respuser, " Person respons. a0_maindata-lastuser, a0_maindata-ldate, a0_maindata-ltime.
MODIFY messages FROM s_msg TRANSPORTING name datum WHERE NOT msgnr IS INITIAL OR msgnr IS INITIAL.

ITEM.TEXT: Unanonymized component data (set back default values)

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA s_msg LIKE LINE OF messages.
IF a0_maindata-respuser IS INITIAL. a0_maindata-respuser = sy-uname. ENDIF. s_msg-name = a0_maindata-respuser. MODIFY messages FROM s_msg TRANSPORTING name WHERE name IS INITIAL.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_maindata. INCLUDE TYPE t100a. TYPES: END OF ts_maindata `

BEGIN OF ts_msgtext, msgnr TYPE msgnr, * T100U name TYPE syuname, datum TYPE sydatum, selfdef TYPE doku_selfd, * Documetation : long text application TYPE tdobject, typ TYPE doku_typ, dokform TYPE tdformnew, dokstyle TYPE tdstyle, * T100 & documentation texts TYPE tt_texts, END OF ts_msgtext `
BEGIN OF ts_text, * T100T langu TYPE spras, short_txt TYPE string, long_txt TYPE ts_lang, END OF ts_text `
tt_msgtexts TYPE SORTED TABLE OF ts_msgtext WITH UNIQUE KEY msgnr `
tt_texts TYPE SORTED TABLE OF ts_text WITH UNIQUE KEY langu `
